How many people are affected by Pompe disease ?,"Pompe disease affects about 1 in 40,000 people in the United States. The incidence of this disorder varies among different ethnic groups.",GHR,Pompe disease
What are the genetic changes related to Pompe disease ?,"Mutations in the GAA gene cause Pompe disease. The GAA gene provides instructions for producing an enzyme called acid alpha-glucosidase (also known as acid maltase). This enzyme is
